column5: This spring we fished Keeley Lake (in May)in Saskatchewan, and had some of the greatest fishing of our lives. Twelve of us went and we caught many nice walleyes and pike (pickerals & jacks). Lots of 8lb+ pike and many 4 to 5lb walleye. The largest Pike went over 20lbs and I had a walleye hooked (that I lost-You've heard that one before) that went 8lbs+. I would recommend the Keeley Lake Lodge to anyone, the facilities were great!! I've heard that Canoe Lake is very good too and am wondering if anyone has any info on a good lodge or how the fishing is on Canoe.
